main event: A disc-shaped UFO was observed over Sandersville, Georgia on August 6, 1960.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 30-50 feet in diameter and had a white and greenish-blue color., The sighting duration was reported for about 30 seconds to 3 minutes., Radar detected the object, indicating both slow and fast movement before it disappeared., Multiple witnesses corroborated the sighting, but details remained vague and conflicting., The case was classified as Unidentified Data with no conclusions reached.
witness description: Individuals residing in the area observed the object.
